item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 8, 2025 at 1:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Postgres Just Cracked the Top Fastest Databases for Analytics (279 points | 58 comments)

3. Show HN: Open-Source DocumentAI with Ollama (174 points | 20 comments)
4. PayPal honey extension has again "featured" flag in Chrome web store (242 points | 107 comments)

7. Extend (YC W23) is hiring engineers to build LLM document processing ( | hide)
8. Mountains, Cliffs, and Caves: A Guide to Using Perlin Noise for Procedural Gen (113 points | 20 comments)

11. Polars Cloud: The Distributed Cloud Architecture to Run Polars Anywhere (218 points | 77 comments)
12. Introducing command And commandfor In HTML (358 points | 211 comments)
13. Forces deep underground seem to be deforming Earth's inner core (9 points | 2 comments)
14. What We Lose When Our Memories Exist in Our Phones (9 points | discuss)
15. Feds Link Cyberheist to 2022 LastPass Hacks (334 points | 197 comments)

20. Optimistic Locking in B-Trees (153 points | 42 comments)

22. Unleashed Recompiled: PC port of the Xbox 360 version of Sonic Unleashed (112 points | 20 comments)
23. Ask HN: Is Cursor deleting working code for you too or is it just me? (40 points | 34 comments)
24. AI models makes precise copies of cuneiform characters (10 points | discuss)
25. The features of Python's help() function (117 points | 48 comments)
26. Age Verification Laws: A Backdoor to Surveillance (495 points | 325 comments)
27. Athena spacecraft declared dead after toppling over on moon (219 points | 291 comments)
28. Strobelight: A profiling service built on open source technology (155 points | 47 comments)
29. 'Next-Level' Chaos Traces the True Limit of Predictability (62 points | 15 comments)
